name: Stack: Temporal Workflow Development
description: Complete Temporal development environment with Temporal Server, UI, and CLI for building reliable workflows.

temporalUiPort.description: Port to expose the Temporal UI web interface.

includeRedis.description: Include a Redis sidecar for caching and session management.

temporalVersion.description: Version of Temporal CLI to install (e.g., 'latest' or '1.5.1').
